profile:
Grout owners have a love-hate relationship with grout. When the grout is clean, they love it, but when it starts to age, crack, break, and stain, it is an embarrassing situation, especially when the in-laws arrive to see the baby and puppy. 

The explanation for this nasty grout phenomenon; the grout was not sealed after installation causing nature to alter the grout forever.

Refreshing grout without removal is the best and most reasonable way to conquer nasty grout, and it saves tile from the landfill. 

Enjoy professionally cleaned grout and tile; grout is repaired and freshly sealed for easy spill clean-up. Achieve expert marks for excellent grout without scrubbing a grout line.

Contact My Clean Grout (780-417-9080) for a free consultation and yearly maintenance. 

Beautify your space with fresh-looking tile and grout every day until you move.

Yearly maintenance is $150.00 and a GREAT GIFT IDA for mom.

MyCleanGrout.com
www.mycleangrout.com
780-417-9080
